remove-hazards.name: Randomly Remove Hazards
remove-hazards.description: Removes N number of visible hazards when player dies.

hazard-amount.name: Hazards to Remove
hazard-amount.description: Maximum amount of hazards to be hidden. Only works when "Randomly Remove Hazards" is enabled.

rem-alg.name: Use Different Alghorithm
rem-alg.description: Uses different alghorithm to search and remove hazards. Works more accurately but less visible to human eye.

play-animation.name: Play Animation
play-animation.description: Plays small animation when hazards are disappearing.

enable-real-hitboxes.name: Enable Accurate Hitboxes
enable-real-hitboxes.description: Enables actual hitboxes for spikes and saws. Makes most levels impossible but in some cases could be a fun challenge.

show-real-hitboxes.name: Show Accurate Hitboxes
show-real-hitboxes.description: Makes real hitbox outlines visible in-game. Only works when "Enable Real Hitboxes" is enabled.
